rules.name: myRule_1
rules.label: Incoming Licence LPO CMA CPA - Approved or StartDate Changed?

Flow.description: Detects updates to Licence and updates related some fields and related records. Extended to support CMA, CPA, PP

value.stringValue: IF( OR(MONTH( [Account].Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c ) = 12, MONTH( [Account].Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c ) = 10, MONTH( [Account].Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c ) = 8, MONTH( [Account].Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c ) = 7, MONTH( [Account].Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c ) = 5, MONTH( [Account].Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c ) = 3, MONTH( [Account].Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c ) = 1), DATE( YEAR( [Account].Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c ) + 1, MONTH( [Account].Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c ), 31), IF( MONTH( [Account].Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c ) = 2, IF( OR( MOD( YEAR( [Account].Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c) + 1, 400 ) = 0, AND(MOD( YEAR( [Account].Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c) + 1, 4 ) = 0, MOD( YEAR( [Account].Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c) + 1, 100 ) != 0 ) ), DATE( YEAR( [Account].Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c ) + 1, 2,29), DATE( YEAR( [Account].Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c ) + 1, 2,28) ), DATE( YEAR( [Account].Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c ) + 1, MONTH( [Account].Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c ) ,30) ) )

formulas.name: formula_4_myRule_1_A1_EndDate
formulas.expression: IF( OR(MONTH( {!myVariable_current.Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c} ) = 12, MONTH( {!myVariable_current.Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c} ) = 10, MONTH( {!myVariable_current.Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c} ) = 8, MONTH( {!myVariable_current.Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c} ) = 7, MONTH( {!myVariable_current.Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c} ) = 5, MONTH( {!myVariable_current.Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c} ) = 3, MONTH( {!myVariable_current.Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c} ) = 1), DATE( YEAR( {!myVariable_current.Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c} ) + 1, MONTH( {!myVariable_current.Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c} ), 31), IF( MONTH( {!myVariable_current.Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c} ) = 2, IF( OR( MOD( YEAR( {!myVariable_current.Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c}) + 1, 400 ) = 0, AND(MOD( YEAR( {!myVariable_current.Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c}) + 1, 4 ) = 0, MOD( YEAR( {!myVariable_current.Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c}) + 1, 100 ) != 0 ) ), DATE( YEAR( {!myVariable_current.Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c} ) + 1, 2,29), DATE( YEAR( {!myVariable_current.Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c} ) + 1, 2,28) ), DATE( YEAR( {!myVariable_current.Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c} ) + 1, MONTH( {!myVariable_current.Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c} ) ,30) ) )
